Subject: Aircraft becomes ready (ARDT)
Source Text: Definition The time when all doors are closed, boarding bridge removed, push back vehicle connected, ready to taxi immediately upon reception of TWR instructions (ARDT).

Subject: AO/GH provides ARDT
Source Text: Origin and priority Provided by the Aircraft Operator/ Ground Handler.

Subject: ACISP receives and updates ARDT
Source Text: First step: To inform all relevant Airport CDM Partners of Actual Ready Time (ARDT) in the Airport CDM Platform and that the aircraft is ready for start up / push-back.

Subject: ATC refines pre-departure sequence
Source Text: Effect ATC refines the pre-departure sequence. The pilot requests start up just before TSAT, following coordination with the Ground Handler. (Dispatcher / Supervisor / Redcap).

Subject: Pilot requests start up
Source Text: Effect ATC refines the pre-departure sequence. The pilot requests start up just before TSAT, following coordination with the Ground Handler. (Dispatcher / Supervisor / Redcap).

Subject: Pilot coordinates with Ground Handler
Source Text: Effect ATC refines the pre-departure sequence. The pilot requests start up just before TSAT, following coordination with the Ground Handler. (Dispatcher / Supervisor / Redcap).

Subject: ACISP checks for missing ARDT
Source Text: Second step: To inform the AO/GH that TOBT has passed and the Airport CDM Platform has not yet received ARDT or Ready Status (RDY).

Subject: ACISP informs AO/GH of missing ARDT
Source Text: Second step: To inform the AO/GH that TOBT has passed and the Airport CDM Platform has not yet received ARDT or Ready Status (RDY).

Subject: Input to Airport CDM Platform
Source Text: This procedure is triggered by n an input to the Airport CDM Platform.

Subject: Input to Airport CDM Platform
Source Text: This procedure is triggered by n an input to the Airport CDM Platform.

Subject: AO/GH informs of ARDT/RDY
Source Text: Inform of ARDT or RDY confirming that the flight follows the indicated TOBT.

Subject: Operational Status changes to READY
Source Text: Operational Status (changes to) READY

Subject: ACISP monitors for ready status by TOBT + tolerance
Source Text: At TOBT + tolerance the AO/GH are informed that TOBT has passed and there has not been a ready status message yet.

Subject: ACISP informs AO/GH of TOBT passed without ready status
Source Text: At TOBT + tolerance the AO/GH are informed that TOBT has passed and there has not been a ready status message yet.

Subject: ACISP informs AO/GH of TOBT passed without ready status
Source Text: At TOBT + tolerance the AO/GH are informed that TOBT has passed and there has not been a ready status message yet.
